cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 25th Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 25th Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Features all the essentials including under bed luggage storage, wifi and security card access.  Bed linen is provided.  BYO towels.  Enjoy the privacy of your own ensuite in this fresh, clean room.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Enjoy the privacy of your own ensuite in this fresh, clean twin room with bed linen. Features all the essentials including flat screen TV, WIFI and security card access.  Towels & soap provided.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:

privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Enjoy the privacy of your own ensuite in this fresh, clean room with bed linen. Features all the essentials including flat screen TV, WIFI and security card access.   Queen size bed. Towels & soap provided.

privates.name: 4 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Features all the essentials including luggage lockers, WiFi, keycard access, fan and heater. Two sets of bunk beds are made up with bed linen and towels.  Enjoy the privacy of your own ensuite in this fresh, clean room.
